meta.title: Link
meta.desscription: Use BootstrapVue's custom <b-link> component for generating a standard <a> link or <router-link>. <b-link> supports the disabled state and click event propagation.

target.description: Sets the 'target' attribute on the rendered link

event.description: router-link prop: The event to use to trigger the link. You should leave this at the default value
